name: Fenglope

ability.name: Wind And Clouds
ability.description: Can be ridden. Can double jump while mounted.

description: In ancient times, it was a familiar subject for painting because of its beautiful and majestic appearance. Fenglope is an endangered species, the "Fenglope" whose beautiful fur and horns are much sought after by poachers!

skills.name: Air Cannon
skills.description: Quickly fires a burst of highly pressurized air.

skills.name: Aqua Gun
skills.description: Hurls a ball of water straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Cloud Tempest
skills.description: Fenglope's exclusive skill. Charges forward while manipulating the atmosphere to create a pressurized wind tunnel around itself.

skills.name: Acid Rain
skills.description: Creates acidic clouds that pour down acid rain on enemies.

skills.name: Aqua Burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Blizzard Spike
skills.description: Creates a giant lump of ice and hurls it at an enemy. It deals damage to those in the surrounding area upon impact.

skills.name: Pal Blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
